questions.text: Which Pandas method is used to remove rows or columns with missing values?
questions.explanation: `dropna()` is used to remove rows or columns containing NaN values based on specified criteria.

questions.text: The `.astype()` method in Pandas can be used to convert a column to a different data type.
questions.explanation: `.astype()` is the primary method for casting a Pandas object to a specified dtype.

options.text: Converts all values in the column to integers.
Finds the lowest value in the string column.
Converts all string values in the column to lowercase.
Checks if all strings in the column are lowercase.

questions.explanation: The `.str.lower()` accessor method converts string data in a Series to lowercase.
